typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		entity as string,
		extid as integer,
		dvguid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '',
	format: 'query') ~> ProductTextTypeGuids
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		CreateTimeSpan as timestamp,
		CreateUserId as integer,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		ModifyTimeSpan as timestamp,
		ModifyUserId as integer,
		ProductId as integer,
		ProductTextTypeId as integer,
		Description as string,
		Rowversion as binary
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLProductTexts
ProductTextTypeGuids filter(entity == 'cr01c_producttexttype') ~> FilterProductTextTypeGuids
FilterProductTextTypeGuids, SQLProductTexts join(extid == ProductTextTypeId,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTextTypeGuidstoProductTexts
JoinTextTypeGuidstoProductTexts select(mapColumn(
		dvguid,
		Id,
		CreateTimeSpan,
		CreateUserId,
		IsDeleted,
		ModifyTimeSpan,
		ModifyUserId,
		ProductId,
		ProductTextTypeId,
		Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tmpProductTexts
